#!/bin/sh
PID_FILE=/var/run/engines/eleasticsearch.pid

export PID_FILE

. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh
wait_for_signal()
{
    while ! test -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_term -o -f /home/engines/run/flags/sig_quit 
     do
      sleep 3600 &
      wait
     done
}


memory=`expr $Memory - 240`
cd /home/app/elasticsearch
ES_JAVA_OPTS=" -XX:UseAVX=0 -Xms${Memory}m -Xmx${Memory}m" ./bin/elasticsearch -Enode.name=$node_name &
sleep 120
echo $! > $PID_FILE
if ! test -d /home/fs/config/state/creds/
 then
  mkdir -p /home/fs/config/state/creds/
fi
if ! test -f /home/fs/config/state/creds/inited
 then
   password=_Engines_System(random(18)) #move this to a template file and then delete
   echo backup:$password > /home/fs/state/creds/backup
   /home/app/elasticsearch/bin/elasticsearch-setup-passwords auto -b |grep PASSWORD >> /home/fs/config/state/creds/initial
   
   elastic_creds=`cat /home/fs/config/state/creds/initial |grep elastic | sed "/PASSWORD /s///" | sed "/ = /s//:/"`
   
   
 curl -u $elastic_creds  -X POST _Engines_Builder(engine_name):9200/_security/role/cluster_backup  \
     -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"cluster":["monitor","create_snapshot","manage"],
            "indices":[],"applications":[],"run_as":[],"metadata":{},"transient_metadata":{"enabled":true}
    }'
   
   
 curl -u $elastic_creds  -X POST "_Engines_Builder(engine_name):9200/_security/user/backup" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d'
{
  "password" : "'$password'",
  "roles" : [ "cluster_backup" ],
  "full_name" : "Backup",
  "email" : "Backup@engines.internal",
  "metadata" : {
    "Usage" : "Backup"
  }
}
'
 #!/bin/sh

creds=`cat /home/fs/config/state/creds/backup`

curl -u $creds -X PUT "_Engines_Builder(engine_name):9200/_snapshot/engines_backup" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d'
{
  "type": "fs",
  "settings": {
    "location": "/home/fs/backup"
  }
}
' 
 
 touch /home/fs/config/state/creds/inited
fi   

startup_complete
wait_for_signal
shutdown_complete

template_files.content:
path:
    data: /home/fs/data/
    logs: /home/fs/logs/
    repo: /home/fs/backup/

network:
  host: _site_
discovery:
  type: single-node


xpack:
  security:
    enabled: true
    authc:
      realms:        
        native:
          native1:
            order: 0
